content: Is there a way to get a Path from a DefId?
I don't think my question is making any sense^^ sorry!

I am trying to take a look at https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/60465
But its not clear what should be done. Would adding a def_id: DefId alongside the path and using it in trait_def_id be enough?
Or do we want to remove trait_def_id entirely and let the previous caller of that function handle the path directly to let them handle errors locally? A few of the user of that method are just unwrapping so I am not sure if it would be an improvement actually.
oh wait I got Path mixed up with Span sorry, ignore me
